page.title: 03PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content: Childrens'Survey of Games Played by grandparents,parents and children. Games still played. Hopscotch,Marbles,Conkers,Football, Skipping,Tag,Tennis,Handstands,Ring Games,Cricket,Rounders,Hide & Seek. Games no longer played. Cats Cradle,Five Stones,Blind Mans Buff,Diabalo,PaperChases,Whips & Tops, Hoops,Kick the Can,Quoits,Shadows. New games. London Spells London,Stickey Glue, Break Dancing,Stone Witch,Traffic Lights,games based on television programmes. Today fewer games are played,skipping and ring games not so popular. Sophisticated toys and games brought to school.The Junior boys frequently play football.Television is very influential in determining games played.
